data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Saint Helena.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Helena, Saint Helena
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, make the 3,706 people in the state of Saint Helena who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Saint Helena, Saint Helena.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 378 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Saint Helena.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Jamestown
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Jamestown, Saint Helena, Saint Helena.
Father, remind your church in Saint Helena, Saint Helena that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Saint Helena against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Saint Helena, Saint Helena. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.
